A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you've never seen a Star Wars movie before and you walked into a theater you would like this movie. However every actual Star Wars fan considers this a slap in the face. Ryan there should be a rule to make a Star Wars movie You Must Be a Star Wars fan! Useless characters\, useless story arcs\, and how do you have a Star wars movie with no Saber fights!  Not one! And Luke refers to a light Saber as a laser sword! ?!? What the actual fuck.
